title: Advanced UPVC Window Manufacturing Machines
excerpt: Discover Parida Red Lion's cutting-edge automated solutions for UPVC window production.
content:
UPVC-3000 Window Profile Welding Machine

At Parida Red Lion, we take pride in delivering innovative window manufacturing machinery that sets new benchmarks in efficiency, automation, and precision. Our UPVC-3000 Profile Welding Machine stands at the forefront of modern window fabrication technology. Engineered to meet the demanding needs of window manufacturers, this machine offers a perfect blend of performance, reliability, and versatility.

High-Speed Production with Precision

The UPVC-3000 is designed for high-speed operation, capable of welding up to 120 corners per hour. This makes it an ideal solution for companies looking to scale their operations without compromising on accuracy. The machine achieves ±0.2mm welding accuracy, ensuring perfect window frame alignment every time.

Built for Versatility

One of the standout features of the UPVC-3000 is its versatility. It can handle a wide range of UPVC profiles, from 50mm to 120mm, making it suitable for various window types including casement, sliding, and tilt-and-turn windows.

Integrated Smart Technology

This machine is equipped with an integrated vision inspection system that ensures each weld meets quality standards. The servo-driven motion control delivers smooth, accurate movements during the welding process, reducing wear and tear and extending machine life.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions: 2500 × 1500 × 1800 mm
  • Weight: 2200 kg
  • Power Requirement: 7.5 kW, 380V, 50Hz
  • Production Capacity: 120 corners/hour
author: Rajesh Parida

title: Energy-Efficient Window Manufacturing Solutions
excerpt: Sustainable production with our GreenLine series of window machines
content:
GreenLine Eco-Window Systems

As global industries move toward sustainability, Parida Red Lion leads the charge with our innovative GreenLine Eco-Window Systems. These specialized machines are engineered to support eco-friendly window manufacturing with reduced energy consumption and material waste.

Energy-Efficient Technology

The GreenLine systems feature low-energy welding technology, which minimizes electricity usage during operation. With a built-in energy monitoring system, operators can track consumption in real time, ensuring efficient operation.

Material Optimization

Our precision cutting systems ensure 15% material savings compared to conventional machines, reducing UPVC waste and supporting sustainable manufacturing practices.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions: 2400×1400×1700mm
  • Weight: 2100kg
  • Power: 6.5kW, 380V 50Hz
  • Energy Savings: Up to 30%
author: Sunita Reddy

title: High-Speed Aluminum Window Production Line
excerpt: Parida Red Lion's UltraSpeed series redefines aluminum window manufacturing efficiency
content:
AluSpeed 500 Production Line

The AluSpeed 500 from Parida Red Lion's UltraSpeed series is designed for manufacturers who demand speed, precision, and reliability in aluminum window production. Capable of processing up to 200 window frames per shift, this system sets a new industry benchmark.

Advanced Cutting and Machining

The AluSpeed 500 features CNC-controlled cutting with ±0.1mm accuracy and automatic corner cleaning for perfect joints. The integrated multi-head machining center drills, mills, and cuts in a single setup.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions: 3000×2000×2200mm
  • Weight: 3500kg
  • Power: 10kW, 380V, 50Hz
  • Production Capacity: 200 frames/shift
author: Vikram Singh

title: Compact Window Machine for Small Manufacturers
excerpt: Affordable, space-saving solution for small window businesses
content:
MiniWindow 100

The MiniWindow 100 is Parida Red Lion's most compact window manufacturing solution, specially designed for small businesses and startups. With a footprint of just 4 square meters, this machine delivers professional-grade performance.

Simple Operation

Featuring one-button operation and intuitive controls, the MiniWindow 100 is perfect for businesses with limited technical staff. It can produce up to 50 window frames per day, handling both UPVC and aluminum profiles.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions: 2000×1200×1600mm
  • Weight: 1500kg
  • Power: 4.5kW, 380V, 50Hz
  • Daily Output: 50 frames
author: Priya Sharma

title: Smart Window Factory 4.0 Solutions
excerpt: IoT-enabled window machines with predictive maintenance
content:
ConnectedWindow System

The ConnectedWindow System by Parida Red Lion is a state-of-the-art solution designed for Industry 4.0. With fully integrated IoT capabilities, this system enables data-driven window manufacturing with real-time monitoring and predictive maintenance.

Smart Features

The system provides real-time production monitoring and predictive maintenance alerts, reducing downtime by up to 30%. Cloud integration allows remote access to production data from anywhere.

  • Dimensions: 2500×1500×2000mm
  • Weight: 2400kg

author: Amit Patel

title: Multi-Station Window Production System
excerpt: High-capacity parallel processing for maximum output
content:
MultiWindow 8XL

The MultiWindow 8XL from Parida Red Lion is the ultimate solution for high-output window manufacturing. Featuring eight fully independent workstations, this system can produce over 500 window frames per shift.

Advanced Automation

Each station is equipped with servo-driven technology for precise operations. The centralized control system allows operators to monitor all stations simultaneously.

Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions: 6000×3000×2500mm
  • Weight: 5800kg
  • Power: 20kW, 380V, 50Hz
  • Production Capacity: 500 frames/shift
author: Neha Gupta
